info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:38PM EDT until July 13 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Essex County in northern New York... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 338 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Schroon, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Moriah, Crown Point, Schroon Lake, Crown Point Center, Port Henry, Shoreham, North Hudson, Schroon Falls, Coates Point, Black Point, Grass Island, Gilligans Bay, Fivemile Point, Chilson, Spar Mill Bay, Murdocks Point, Paradox, Bulwagga Bay, South Schroon, and Pharoah Mountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
